title: Edge of the outback
creator_credit: Stefan Sargent and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: A picture of the life in the region of Longreach, Queensland, at the time of the annual Agricultural Show in a drought season. Without explicit commentary we candidly observe a grazier and his family over several days while they go about their family, business and social life
